result.execSummary:
The defendant Tyreon T Day was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Tyreon T Day is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Tyreon T Day was found guilty of Carry Concealed Weapon, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 941.23(2).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Milwaukee County Clerk of Circuit Court

supervisions.notes: - Pay the DNA surcharge, plus costs and disbursements; failure to pay would result in a civil judgment entered against defendant.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Tyreon T Day

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Order for Cancellation of Huber/Work Release/Electronic Surveillance Privileges signed and filed. Copy sent to House of Correction Lieutenant Rowe, Sheriff's Department, and the State. Deputy Court Clerk ccp.

Huber/Work Release Modification Request
.
Request for Huber / Work Release Modification received from HOC and filed this date.  This case is assigned and forwarded to Judge Rothstein Br 25, for review. os

Defendant having failed to appear at the House of Correction, Court ordered a commitment out for service.  Huber Privileges, electronic monitoring  privileges, and Day Reporting Center REVOKED.  Original commitment received and filed.

FAILURE TO REPORT COMMITMENT REFERRAL:
.
Failure to Report Commitment Referral received from the HOC and filed this date.  This case is assigned and forwarded to Judge Rothstein  Br 25 for review. os
Addition to entry of 6/24/15:  Defendant's report date was ordered by the Court as 7/01/15 by 5:00 p.m.

Defendant Tyreon T Day in court with attorney Michael B Plaisted.  Kimberly Dorice Schoepp appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defense counsel requested a plea and sentencing date.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for June 24, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Tyreon T Day in court with attorney Michael B Plaisted.  Deann Heard for Sara Nicole Volden Schroeder appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case is adjourned to Branch 20, Judge Moroney.  Scheduling conference scheduled for June 2, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Court ordered no possession or use of controlled substances without a valid prescription.
No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.
Defendant advised if released from custody it is a requirement to attend all future court proceedings.
Failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping, a warrant issued or high cash bail.

Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  
Defendant to have no contact with: Simon H.
Court advised defendant that failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.

Defendant Tyreon T Day in court with attorney Alexis Liggins.  Defendant Tyreon T Day in custody.  
Carole Manchester appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  

Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Moroney, Branch 20.  
Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  
Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  
Court enters a plea of not guilty on behalf of defendant reserving his right to enter at next hearing.
DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  
Status conference scheduled for May 19, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
